title: Blood & Wounds Sounds
description: 108 Blood & Gore Sounds. Hope they will help you in your project :)
longDescription:
Hello Creators!


Here's my new pack: “Blood & Wounds Sounds“


YouTube Preview

List of SFX included


The approach for this pack was to create sounds for amazing video games that are explicit in their combats. Let the blood flow!

I recorded some fruits and vegetables in a garage to make this possible.

There are different types of SFX inside this pack: blood, bleeding, stabs, blood spill, punches with blood, bites, flesh, hit with blood, spills, wounds, etc...

They can be used in different styles of video games or other media projects.

I hope you enjoy implementing this sounds in your project!


Related Packs (created by me)

Fantasy Combat Sounds

Sword Combat Sounds


Making-Off

All this sounds were originally recorded with a Zoom H6 (cardiod microphone), and were edited in Logic Pro X, I used plugin like "PitchMonster" that have granular pitch to shape the original recordings.


Some considerations

1. Keep in mind this sounds can be used in a variety of situations, I put a name to the SFX but this doesn’t mean it can’t be used in other contexts.


Check out this guide that maybe will help you


2. The sounds are in 44.1Khz/16 bit format. I have the original files at 96khz/24bit also, if you need this format, please contact me.


Contact

Any doubt, any idea, any proposal, please contact me on: the.sound.guild.sfx@gmail.com


Check all my packs

The Sound Guild
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 108

Number of Audio Cues: 108

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 2 minutes and 10 seconds
